author: Julia Alexander
title: The Batman delayed as Warner Bros. shuffles its DC movies lineup
description: Batman, Shazam 2, and The Flash are three of Warner Bros.’ upcoming DC movies that have received new release dates as the studio shuffles films around due to the novel coronavirus pandemic. Wonder Woman 1984 is still slated for an August 14th, 2020, release a…
content:
Shazam 2 and The Flash also received new release dates
Warner Bros. is delaying Matt Reeves highly anticipated Batman movie by four months as the studio shuffles its broader DC film lineup. 
The Batman was originally supposed to hit theaters on June 25th, 2… [+1861 chars]
